examples.translation: 这幅画在拍卖中值多少钱?
examples.first: How much did the painting go for at the

examples.translation: 那些珠宝公开拍卖以前我们私下看了预展.
examples.first: We had a private view of the jewels before the public

n: a variety of bridge in which tricks made in excess of the contract are scored toward game; now generally superseded by contract bridge
the public sale of something to the highest bidder
